name: Saharan Motor Hotel

reviews.text: The staff at this motel were extremely rude. In my entire life I have never stayed at a hotel where the staff were so unwilling to help the guests in any way and treated so poorly by staff. We had three rooms booked. We had problems with all three rooms some of which were fixed but with pursuasion and others to which the staff just ignored the problems. I could tell all the stories but I find it very irritating and frustrating to even talk about it. I observed the staff be rude to anyone who came with any questions or concerns. The motel was in a convenient location and the rooms were fairly clean but all three had a very strange smell, with each room having a different smell. Definitely was not worth the price we paid. I later found many other similar motels in the area at a much better rate.
reviews.title: poor service

reviews.text: Stayed in Hollywood for New Years Eve. What a blast. The Saharan was great. Nice hotel room with clean bath. Important for girls. Situated street side noise from traffic high but didn't mind went to bed at 3am anyway. Across the street from some very good restaurants. Loved it. Handy for the Guitar Center. Rock on.
reviews.title: Loved the Saharan
Superb Saharan
reviews.text: Keeping in mind that this review is in the context of budget holidays, the Saharan was an extremely impressive place to stay. The rooms were all clean and were cleaned regularly throughout our three week stay. The bed was king size, with a large TV with over 20 channels, AC and an adequate bathroom. They provide coffee in the reception area which was always available. They also provided pastries and fruit juice in the mornings from 7.30am till 9.30am, but it tended to be there until it ran out really.

reviews.title: Clean Budget hotel, W/ Free Wi-Fi!
reviews.text: When we got there and were put in a non smoking room by mistake, the staff were quick and helpful in moving us. The staff were friendly and helpful, even the quieter members, and they called us taxis, let us store our stuff when we checked out and arranged tours for us with hotel pickups - Disneyland etc. They gave us advice on this and amenities in the local area.

Speaking of which there is a Ralphs supermarket across the street and a great chinese takeaway next door on the left....Green Tea Chinese....we would definitely recommend for nights in! And there are plenty of places to eat out nearby - Bossa Nova for one.
reviews.title: The best budget hotel on The Strip!

reviews.text: well i normally just write reviews about good hotels i've stayed in. but i just had to write a review on this place. i picked this place because of the rave reviews it has received. and i guess for around 65 bucks a night (excl tax) its pretty good value for what you get. its pretty clean. big tv's comfy beds and a good location.
reviews.title: do not stay here!!

reviews.text: but thats where its stops. what these reviews dont tell you is that the hotel is used by local prostitutes who take their 'trade' their. i not only disocvered this from locals (who were well away of what goes on there) but also saw 1st hand myself. i normally wonder into my room at 2am after a night on the town so i see what most folk would see in a place like this!
reviews.title: Could not have been better! This hotel is great!
Budget bulls-eye!
reviews.text: they normally take the spa rooms! but if u're a light sleeper, forget getting any shut eye. the rooms are not well insulated against noise.

the most dissapoitning part though is the service. i dont think i have been anywhere which is quite so bad. and the funny thing is, the people who serve you, are the ones who owe the motel. go figure that!!!!!
reviews.title: great for budget

reviews.text: i had several probelms (broken toilet etc) which fell on deaf ears.
reviews.title: reputation alone is not the making of a good hotel

description: Located in the heart of Hollywood, California, the newly remodeled Saharan Hotel is an oasis of hospitality on world-famous Sunset Boulevard. Our friendly, boutique-style hotel delivers a special blend of contemporary flare with vintage Hollywood service. Whether sightseeing or working, the Saharan is an intimate, comfortable lodging that will make you feel like a Hollywood star!
